messages.content: I personally wish that they stuck with the spin offs but if their happy I’m good.👌
And I’m just sitting here wishing my cat would come at least sit by me.
Translation }}} I wish I could afford it.
Other than the jerseys, optic merch is like an after thought. Wish they would step it up more.
Uhhh I want someone to do this for me!
I wish I had known this when my kitty ran off years ago. 😭
Yaaaaaas! I need your curly hair routine!
All I want for Christmas is a broken home
I just want tk be a random scumbag
Don't see a W tonight. We need a miracle.
Yes, because I've always wanted a father figure who throws a tantrum every time he doesn't get his way.
Not yet! But I waiting for a miracle any year now!!
I’d like to know too. How lucky am I that my first ever relationship was with a pwBPD. sigh
I wish I could be desensitized to my sadness sometimes lol
I just spent the whole week sneaking away to smoke, and trying to get into some girls shorts.
Crap. I need more Excedrin. STAT.
Okay rude. Leave [NAME] alone and where he is please. I’ve been rooting for this kid since his first match.
I love [NAME], but man I wish I knew what [NAME] would have been like here.
I would hope that Cartoon Network would have nothing to do with it. Would hate to see them "Teen Titan" ASOIAF.
That’s so scummy, I’m hoping the pepperoni just slid down?
They'd never give her a crown but it would be so good to see her back on my screen.
